action: Share intelligence on threats with other nation
content: Blue offers to share intelligence to help Purple's defense against Orange's aggression. We stand with you.
Blue is deeply concerned by Orange's invasion of Purple. We should coordinate a diplomatic response to this unprovoked aggression.
Orange's attack on Purple threatens regional stability. Blue seeks your support in building a coalition to respond to this act of aggression.
Blue proposes a coordinated sanctions regime with allies to penalize Orange's aggression and deter further escalation. This joint response demonstrates our resolve.
Blue calls on Yellow to join a unified sanctions regime against Orange for their unprovoked attack on Purple. This proportional response can help restore stability.

Blue proposes coordinating our sanctions policies to maximize pressure on Orange to de-escalate. A joint response demonstrates our unity against unprovoked aggression.
